uk.co.strangeskies.fx

Class FXUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.fx.FXUtilities

  • public class FXUtilities
extends Object
    A collection of general utility methods for working with JavaFX and e(fx)clipse.

    • Method Detail

      • runNow

        public static void runNow(Runnable runnable)
        Perform the given action on the JavaFX event thread as soon as possible, returning upon completion. This method is safe whether or not the invoking thread is the event thread.
        Parameters:
        runnable - The action to execute

      • runNow

        public static <T> T runNow(Supplier<T> runnable)
        Perform the given action on the JavaFX event thread as soon as possible, returning the result upon completion. This method is safe whether or not the invoking thread is the event thread.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of value to result from the action
        Parameters:
        runnable - The action to execute
        Returns:
        The result of invoking the given supplier

      • map

        public static <T,U> javafx.collections.ObservableList<T> map(javafx.collections.ObservableList<U> component,
                                                             Function<U,T> mapper)
        Create a new observable list as a transformation of a component observable list.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the elements of the new list
        U - the type of the elements of the component list
        Parameters:
        component - the component list
        mapper - a mapping from the type of the elements of the component list to the type of the elements of the new list
        Returns:
        a new observable list, backed by the given list, with each element in that list transformed according to the given function

      • getResource

        public static URL getResource(Class<?> controllerClass)
        Find the .fxml resource associated with a given controller class by location and naming conventions. The location of the file is assumed to be the same package as the controller class. The name of the file is determined according to the convention described by getResourceName(Class).
        Parameters:
        controllerClass - The controller class whose resource we wish to locate
        Returns:
        The URL for the resource associated with the given controller class.

      • getResourceName

        public static String getResourceName(Class<?> controllerClass)
        Find the name of the .fxml resource associated with a given controller class by convention. The name of the file is assumed to be [classname].fxml, or if [classname] takes the form [classnameprefix]Controller, the name of the file is assumed to be [classnameprefix].fxml.
        Parameters:
        controllerClass - The controller class whose resource we wish to locate
        Returns:
        The URL for the resource associated with the given controller class.

      • getResource

        public static URL getResource(Class<?> controllerClass,
                              String resourceName)
        Find the .fxml resource for a given controller class by location conventions. The location of the file is assumed to be the same package as the controller class.
        Parameters:
        controllerClass - The controller class whose resource we wish to locate
        resourceName - The name of the resource file
        Returns:
        The URL for the resource associated with the given controller class.
